definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: as fetter, Ju Jdg 15:13, Jdg 15:14, Jdg 16:11, Jdg 16:12, Ez Eze 3:25, Eze 4:8, Job 39:10 (of wild ox), so also prob. Ps 118:27 bind the festal victim ([[חַה]]) with cords Ew Ol De Hup-Now Dr al.; > with branches Che, cf. Bae Du; fig. of authority Ps 2:3 (‖[[מוֹסְרוֹתֵימוֹ]]), Ps 129:4.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[עֲבוֹת הָעֲגׇלָה]] Is 5:18 i.e. with which a cart is drawn (in sim.; ‖[[חַבְלֵי הַשָּׁוְא]]); fig. [[עֲבׂתוֹת אַהֲבָה]] Ho 11:4 with the cords of love, of ´[[י]]'s drawing Isr. (‖ [[חַבְלֵי אָדָם]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: cordage, cord, of (twisted) golden chains on high priest's breast-piece (all P): [[מַעֲשֵׂה עֲבׂת]], cordage-work Ex 28:14, Ex 28:22, Ex 39:15; [[שַׁרְשְׁרׂת הָעֲבׂתׂת]] Ex 28:14 the chains of cords (cordlike chains); [[עֲבׂתׂת]]([[הָ]])[[שְׁתֵּי ]] the two cords v:Ex 28:24, v:Ex 28:25, Ex 39:17, Ex 39:18.

interwoven foliage (?) in phr. [[בֵּין עֲבׂתִים]]([[עַל־]]) of top of a vine Ez Eze 19:11 (clouds Ew Hi-Sm Toy, rd. then [[עָבוֹת]]); of cedar, Eze 31:3, Eze 31:10, Eze 31:14, but in these certainly clouds, so LXX Ew Hi-Sm Co al.
